import.could_not_calculate_identifier_for_trans: Could not calculate identifier for this transaction
import.csv_could_not_be_parsed: The CSV file could not be parsed.
import.csv_no_lines_parsed: No lines could be parsed from the CSV file.
import.duplicate_handling_info:
Duplicates are handled by calculating an identifier for each transaction and storing this. This value will be compared during import and transactions with the same identifier will be ignored

<1><0><0>Auto: Automatically calculate an identifier based on transaction source, destination, timestamp and amount.<1><0>Unique ID column: Use a column as a unique identifier<2><0>Allow duplicates: No duplicate checking will occur.
import.encoding_auto_detected_as_value: The encoding was automatically detected as “{{encoding}}”
import.following_failed_due_to_duplicates: The following transactions could not be created due to duplicate identifiers:
import.following_failed_due_to_errors: The following transactions could not be created due to errors:
import.following_successfully_created: The following transactions were created successfully:
import.impossible_csv_github_link: If your bank exported a CSV file that is impossible to import due to missing features in the current importer, you can file an issue on our <1>Github page</1>
import.n_duplicate_transactions: {{count}} transaction has duplicate identifiers. Only one transaction can exist for each identifier.
import.n_duplicate_transactions_plural: {{count}} transactions have duplicate identifiers. Only one transaction can exist for each identifier.
import.n_error_transactions: {{count}} transaction has errors. It will not be created.
import.n_error_transactions_plural: {{count}} transactions have errors. They will not be created.
import.n_transactions_do_not_have_source_destin: {{count}} transaction does not have a source nor destination account. It will not be created.
{{count}} transactions do not have a source nor destination account. They will not be created
import.n_transactions_have_same_source_destinat: {{count}} transaction has the same source and destination. It will not be created.
{{count}} transactions have the same source and destination. They will not be created.
import.no_accounts_found_in_csv: No accounts were found in your CSV file. Check that you have selected the correct columns.

import.only_showing_transactions_no_source_dest: Currently only transactions that have no source or destination account are shown.
import.only_showing_transactions_same_source_de: Currently only transactions with the same source and destination account are shown.
